title: Sonic and All-Stars Racing Transformed Collection
description: Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. It’s Not Just Racing. It’s Racing Transformed Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising

system_requirements.OS: *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
system_requirements.Memory: 1GB Ram (Windows XP), 2GB Ram (Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8)
